# Nick Ward (Welsh musician)

}}
Nick Ward is a Welsh singer-songwriter from Porthcawl, South Wales. He signed to UK label AudioFile Records in 2009 and has many releases to his name. Aside from 22 singles he has released 2 EP's and 7 albums -  Outside Looking In (2009), Pink Bay (2010), Cadenza (2012), World in Reverse (2014), Phonus Balonus (2017) Jorum Of Skee (2024) Everybody Knows The Dice Are Loaded (2025)
Career
Ward has his roots in new wave but isn't afraid to delve into other genres including country, southern rock, americana and folk. Since signing to AudioFile Records he has supported some big-name artists, including The Alarm, Toyah Willcox, Simon Townshend and The Christians. Ward has appeared live in session on the Tom Robinson Show on 6 Music, and played many live sets on BBC Radio Wales
